name: Game & Watch Gallery 4 (itch)
description:
Playable 3D simulation of this   classic handheld electronic game including views of the original packaging and instruction guide . A RetroFab simulation Version 0.9.5b Details Title Game & Watch Gallery 4 / Game & Watch Gallery Advance Model No. AGB-AQWE / AGB-AQWP Series Game Boy Advance Manufacturer Nintendo Release Date October 25, 2002 Chipset Sharp LR35902 ( 4.2 MHz ) Description

Game & Watch Gallery 4 is a collection of six classic Game & Watch titles from Nintendo remade for the Game Boy Advance handheld console.

Gameplay

You can play each of the six Game & Watch titles included in this collection based on the gameplay of the original LCD handhelds (Classic mode) or in an updated version (Modern mode) with new graphics, colors, sound effects and all your favorite Nintendo characters.

  • Fire
    Catch the characters jumping from a burning building and help them to the ambulance.
     
  • Boxing
    Try to knock out your opponent in a head-to-head bout!
     
  • Rain Shower
    Prevent laundry hung outside to dry from getting wet in the rain.
     
  • Mario's Cement Factory
    Help Mario to keep loading cement into waiting trucks by operating a series of concrete mixers.
     
  • Donkey Kong Jr.
    Help Junior grab the key and free Donkey Kong from his cage.
     
  • Donkey Kong 3
    Blast the bees with your spray bottle and push them back at Donkey Kong.
     
Controls Keyboard Start Enter Select Space Button A X Button B Z Up W or Up Arrow Down S or Down Arrow Left A or Left Arrow Right D or Right Arrow Mouse Rotate Drag Press Left-click Zoom Mousewheel
